00027 class EffectNoiseRemoval: public Effect {
00028    
00029 public:
00030    
00031    EffectNoiseRemoval();
00032    virtual ~EffectNoiseRemoval();
00033 
00034    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00035       return wxString(_("Noise Removal..."));
00036    }
00037    
00038    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00039       std::set<wxString> result;
00040       result.insert(wxT("http://audacityteam.org/namespace#NoiseRemoval"));
00041       return result;
00042    }
00043 
00044    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00045       return wxString(wxT("NoiseRemoval"));
00046    }
00047 
00048    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00049       if (mDoProfile)
00050          return wxString(_("Creating Noise Profile"));
00051       else
00052          return wxString(_("Removing Noise"));
00053    }
00054    
00055    virtual bool PromptUser();
00056    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00057    
00058    virtual bool Init();
00059    virtual bool CheckWhetherSkipEffect();
00060    virtual bool Process();
00061    
00062 private:
00063    void CleanSpeechMayReadNoisegate();
00064    void CleanSpeechMayWriteNoiseGate();
00065 
00066    bool      mDoProfile;
00067    bool      mHasProfile;
00068    int       mLevel;
00069 
00070    // Parameters chosen before the first phase
00071    double    mSampleRate;
00072    int       mWindowSize;
00073    int       mSpectrumSize;
00074    float     mMinSignalTime;    // in secs
00075 
00076    // The frequency-indexed noise threshold derived during the first
00077    // phase of analysis
00078    float    *mNoiseThreshold;  // length is mSpectrumSize
00079 
00080    // Parameters that affect the noise removal, regardless of how the
00081    // noise profile was extracted
00082    double     mFreqSmoothingHz;
00083    double     mNoiseGain;              // in dB, should be negative
00084    double     mAttackDecayTime;        // in secs
00085 
00086    bool ProcessOne(int count, WaveTrack * track,
00087                    sampleCount start, sampleCount len);
00088 
00089    void Initialize();
00090    void StartNewTrack();
00091    void ProcessSamples(sampleCount len, float *buffer);
00092    void FillFirstHistoryWindow();
00093    void ApplyFreqSmoothing(float *spec);
00094    void GetProfile();
00095    void RemoveNoise();
00096    void RotateHistoryWindows();
00097    void FinishTrack();
00098    void Cleanup();
00099 
00100    // Variables that only exist during processing
00101    WaveTrack            *mOutputTrack;
00102    sampleCount       mInSampleCount;
00103    sampleCount       mOutSampleCount;
00104    int                   mInputPos;
00105 
00106    int       mFreqSmoothingBins;
00107    int       mAttackDecayBlocks;
